content: The US reality TV star Kylie Jenner confirmed on Sunday that she has given birth to a baby girl. The 20-year-old was rumoured to be expecting a child, but had remained quiet about her pregnancy. Jenner announced on Instagram on Sunday that she had given birth on 1 February. She apologised for keeping her followers and fans in the dark. The new-born is Jenner and rapper Travis Scott's first child and they have not decided on a name yet  ♥️ A post shared by  Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Feb 4, 2018 at 12:27pm PST End of Instagram post  by kyliejenner Jenner had first been rumoured to be pregnant in September, however no official announcement was made. Kylie Jenner, the youngest of the Kardashian-Jenner siblings, rose to prominence through the TV series Keeping Up with the Kardashians, along with her sister Kendall and half-sisters Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé Kardashian. Jenner is a prominent personality on social media and also has her own make-up brand. She is the daughter of the Olympics decathlon winner Caitlyn Jenner and TV personality Kris Jenner.
title: US reality TV star Kylie Jenner gives birth to baby girl - BBC News
